byline.contributor: Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Tel Aviv.

abstract: Obama administration is planning to build new military base in Iraq's Anbar Province and deploy 400 American military trainers to help Iraqi forces retake city of Ramadi from Islamic State; in strategic shift, lengthy campaign is planned to recapture Mosul from ISIS at later date, possibly not until 2016.
lead_paragraph: The effort to retake Ramadi and push back the Islamic State effectively delays plans to recapture the city of Mosul this year.

headline.main: U.S. Embracing a New Approach on Battling ISIS in Iraq
headline.print_headline: U.S. Embracing a New Approach on Battling ISIS

snippet: The effort to retake Ramadi and push back the Islamic State effectively delays plans to recapture the city of Mosul this year.
